instructions:
In an 8-inch non-stick skillet, add all the above ingredients except the potatoes. Heat over med/low and
simmer this syrup for 1 minute. Add potatoes and simmer until syrup is cooked down *(7 to 9 minutes)* while
turning potatoes. Serves 2. *(Revised 2/26/00)*
ingredients: 1 can (9 oz) Taylor's sweet potatoes, drained
3 tbsp of above saved potato liquid
name: Candied Sweet Potatoes
